component.description: OutputLabel is an extension to the standard outputLabel.
component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes;
value false java.lang.String true Label to display.
accesskey false java.lang.String true The accesskey attribute is a standard HTML attribute that sets the access key that transfers focus to this element when pressed.
dir false java.lang.String true Direction indication for text that does not inherit directionality. Valid values are LTR and RTL.
escape false java.lang.Boolean true Defines if value should be escaped or not.
for false java.lang.String true Id of the associated input component.
lang false java.lang.String true The lang attribute is a standard HTML attribute that sets the code describing the language to be used in the markup generated by this component..
tabindex false java.lang.String true Position in the tabbing order.
title false java.lang.String true Advisory tooltip informaton.
style false java.lang.String true Inline style of the component.
styleClass false java.lang.String true Style class of the component.
onblur false java.lang.String true Client side callback to execute when component loses focus.
onclick false java.lang.String true Client side callback to execute when component is clicked.
ondblclick false java.lang.String true Client side callback to execute when component is double clicked.
onfocus false java.lang.String true Client side callback to execute when component receives focus.
onkeydown false java.lang.String true Client side callback to execute when a key is pressed down over component.
onkeypress false java.lang.String true Client side callback to execute when a key is pressed and released over component.
onkeyup false java.lang.String true Client side callback to execute when a key is released over component.
onmousedown false java.lang.String true Client side callback to execute when a pointer button is pressed down over component.
onmousemove false java.lang.String true Client side callback to execute when a pointer button is moved within component.
onmouseout false java.lang.String true Client side callback to execute when a pointer button is moved away from component.
onmouseover false java.lang.String true Client side callback to execute when a pointer button is moved onto component.
onmouseup false java.lang.String true Client side callback to execute when a pointer button is released over component.
